-- Database: DPM_TestingDB

-- DROP DATABASE "DPM_TestingDB";

CREATE DATABASE "DPM_TestingDB"
    WITH 
    OWNER = postgres
    ENCODING = 'UTF8'
    LC_COLLATE = 'English_India.1252'
    LC_CTYPE = 'English_India.1252'
    TABLESPACE = pg_default
    CONNECTION LIMIT = -1;
	


-- Table: public.addrulemodel

-- DROP TABLE public.addrulemodel;

CREATE TABLE public.addrulemodel
(
    "AddRuleId" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "Columns" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Alarm" real NOT NULL,
    "Trigger" real NOT NULL,
    "Condition" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "PK_tbl_AddRuleModel" PRIMARY KEY ("AddRuleId")
)
WITH (
    OIDS = FALSE
)
TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE public.addrulemodel
    OWNER to postgres;



-- Table: public.compressuredetails

-- DROP TABLE public.compressuredetails;

CREATE TABLE public.compressuredetails
(
    "BatchId" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "TenantId" integer NOT NULL,
    "PS1" numeric NOT NULL,
    "PD1" numeric NOT NULL,
    "PS2" numeric NOT NULL,
    "PD2" numeric NOT NULL,
    "TS1" numeric NOT NULL,
    "TD1" numeric NOT NULL,
    "TS2" numeric NOT NULL,
    "TD2" numeric NOT NULL,
    "InsertedDate" timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    "ProcessingStage" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "PK_tbl_Compressuredetails" PRIMARY KEY ("BatchId")
)
WITH (
    OIDS = FALSE
)
TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE public.compressuredetails
    OWNER to postgres;


-- Table: public.compressurewithclassification

-- DROP TABLE public.compressurewithclassification;

CREATE TABLE public.compressurewithclassification
(
    "CompClassID" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "BatchId" integer NOT NULL,
    "TenantId" integer NOT NULL,
    "ClassificationId" integer NOT NULL,
    "PS1" numeric NOT NULL,
    "PD1" numeric NOT NULL,
    "PS2" numeric NOT NULL,
    "PD2" numeric NOT NULL,
    "TS1" numeric NOT NULL,
    "TD1" numeric NOT NULL,
    "TS2" numeric NOT NULL,
    "TD2" numeric NOT NULL,
    "InsertedDate" timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    "Classification" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "PK_tbl_Compressurewithclassification" PRIMARY KEY ("CompClassID")
)
WITH (
    OIDS = FALSE
)
TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE public.compressurewithclassification
    OWNER to postgres;


-- Table: public.contactus

-- DROP TABLE public.contactus;

CREATE TABLE public.contactus
(
    "ContactUsId" integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "To" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Email" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Subject" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Comment" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT contactus_pkey PRIMARY KEY ("ContactUsId")
)
WITH (
    OIDS = FALSE
)
TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE public.contactus
    OWNER to postgres;



-- Table: public.RegisterUsers

-- DROP TABLE public."RegisterUsers";

CREATE TABLE public."RegisterUsers"
(
    "Id" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "FullName" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "UserName" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "NormalizedUserName" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Email" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "NormalizedEmail" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "EmailConfirmed" boolean NOT NULL,
    "PasswordHash" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "SecurityStamp" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "ConcurrencyStamp" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "PhoneNumber" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "PhoneNumberConfirmed" boolean NOT NULL,
    "TwoFactorEnabled" boolean NOT NULL,
    "LockoutEnd" timestamp with time zone,
    "LockoutEnabled" boolean NOT NULL,
    "AccessFailedCount" integer NOT NULL,
    "Company" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "PK_RegisterUsers" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
)
WITH (
    OIDS = FALSE
)
TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE public."RegisterUsers"
    OWNER to postgres;





-- Table: public.registeruser

-- DROP TABLE public.registeruser;

CREATE TABLE public.registeruser
(
    "RegistrationId" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "UserName" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "FullName" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Email" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "PhoneNumber" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Password" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "PK_registeruser" PRIMARY KEY ("RegistrationId")
)
WITH (
    OIDS = FALSE
)
TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE public.registeruser
    OWNER to postgres;
